column5: Holy!!! If this isn't uber cool. I want one!!!!  http://www.bullseyecamera.com/

A good spottting scope can spot 22 calibre holes at 200 yds., I've seen a few chronograph screens hit by bullets over the years and these are more expensive ( ie. more likely to hake a hit ), I've never taken out my Chrony, touch wood.  Besides a spotting scope has many uses away from the range, for the same or less cash.
Very cool.  But at 350 USD for the most basic 300 yard version there wont be one in my future.  That's what a good set of binoculars are for.
